lead_paragraph: Asjha Jones had 22 points last night, tying her career high for the second straight game, to lead the host Connecticut Sun to a 66-52 victory over the Liberty. The Liberty (7-21) had its three-game winning streak snapped. The Liberty All-Star guard Becky Hammon played for the first time in 10 games. Hammon, who had a sprained left ankle, played just over 11 minutes and finished with 2 points and 2 assists.
